trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>classe quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>é desenhado e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor da propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class contains all the information needed to paint the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the ToolTip text, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>classe contém todas as informações necessárias para pintura o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, incluindo o texto da descrição, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto no qual deve ser feito o desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to perform your customized drawing.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar o aspeto da descrição, utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>para determinar os limites da descrição e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto para efetuar o desenho personalizado.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>antes de ser apresentado pelo processamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DrawToolTipEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado DrawToolTipEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os delegados do processador de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
